name: Uxie LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_power.name: Trade Off
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck. This power can’t be used if Uxie is affected by a Special Condition. You can’t use more than 1 Trade Off Poké-Power each turn.

attacks.name: Zen Blade
attacks.effect: Uxie can’t use Zen Blade during your next turn.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Uxie. Uxie LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
